code: @Test public void testPollEnrichNullBody() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint("mock:result").expectedBodiesReceived("Hello World").     template.sendBody("seda:foo", "Hello World").     template.sendBody("direct:start", null).     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:start").pollEnrich("seda:foo", 1000).to("mock:result").         }     }. }
